extendedInfo.description: ââââ The Number 1 Offers & Coupons App on Google Play ââââUSER REVIEWS ââBrilliant - I love this app. Using DelightCircle makes my life delightful and am so delighted to use it .. It has reduced 5k last on my monthly wagesâ - Rajni MurugesanâIts location based search is awesome and best in business.â - Anand******************************************************Join thousands of people who discover the best selection of in-store mobile coupons & offers from 350+ brands and 25,000+ stores & restaurants in India. This app also helps you to discover amazing places to shop & eat around you with Augmented Reality.Earn real rewards like free mobile recharge, movie tickets and gift cards for simply visiting the stores, and checking out their new arrivals.Search and find offers, prices across various merchants in your locality. Find Mobile Phones, Apparel, Grocery, Footwear, Digital Cameras, Laptops, Watches  & Other Products at best price.Discover and share insider tips and reviews from local experts and your friends. Manage all your loyalty cards in one place.Never shop without a coupon or offer again! Download the free app today and experience the awesomeness !DelightCircle covers over 175 malls across India including Inorbit, Phoenix malls, DLF malls, Forum, Mantri Square, Gopalan, etc.Mobile coupons are updated daily from tons of retailers & brands like Hypercity, Reliance Digital, Shoppers Stop, Big Bazaar, Home Town, Central, Brand Factory, Croma, More, Puma, Nike, Adidas, Reebok, Louis Phillippe, Arrow, Reliance Trends, Reliance Fresh/Mart and more. Includes offers from restaurants like Cafe Coffee Day, Barista, Domino's Pizza, Mc Donalds, KFC, Kaati Zone, Mast Kalandar and more.Press:DelightCircle is a shopping app to help you pick out the best deals in the shops around you. A must-have for all ye Android and iOS shopaholics. - ThinkDigitConnect with us: Visit us at http://delightcircle.com or email your feedback to us at support@delightcircle.com. Follow us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/DelightCircle or follow us at @DelightCircle on Twitter------------------------READ CONTACT DATAReading your address book permission is required if you need to share the app with your friends (explicit permission will be sought before this)TAKE PICTURES AND VIDEOSThe app requires permission to use the device camera to provide the ability to scan barcodes for walk-in and checking out new arrivals. By scanning the barcodes, you earn rewards. We do not record or store any photos or images.------------------------Other Keywords: Delight Circle, Delight, Circle, City Guide, Check-In, New Arrivals, Local, Restaurant Finder, GPS, yellow pages, Banks & ATMs, Augmented Reality, Local Search, Discounts on Mobile
